summary: Innovative Accountant with 8+ years of experience spanning oil and gas services, manufacturing, and trading. Proficient in IFRS and US GAAP, working capital management, cost control, internal controls, ERP implementations (Oracle, Hyperion, QuickBooks), statutory compliance, payroll and inventory management, budgeting and forecasting, planning, and decision support. Proven ability to lead teams, manage tight deadlines, develop KPIs and governance frameworks to optimize financial performance.
